definition: old learning/Chinese traditional teaching as opposed to material from the West

sentences.english: Before modern times the "Old-Learning" had an absolute predomination in the educational field.
sentences.chinese: 近代以前，中國社會以傳統的“舊學”教育一統天下。

sentences.english: Many foreigners are interested in traditional Chinese culture.
sentences.chinese: 外國人對中國的舊學很感興趣。
